resources.string: Failed to start mask. Please check whether the system has denied the permissions.
Can you see this message? If you can, ScreenFilter is working well.\nIt will automatically stop after 5 seconds if you don\'t press OK.
Click here to open settings or Swipe to stop ScreenFilter
Recommended mode. It is stable, although it cannot dim navigation bar and prevent user from clicking \"Install\" or \"Allow\" in permission dialog.
Recommended mode. It is stable, although it cannot dim navigation bar and prevent user from clicking \"Install\" or \"Allow\" in permission dialog.
You can dim both status bar and navigation bar. However, it may make screen flashing in some apps.
It may not automatically activate/deactivate on time because of Android 6.0 Doze mode. If you have any problem, try to request system to ignore battery optimization.
